dhp320:3: I shall put up with abuse,
dhp320:4: for so many folk are badly behaved.
dhp321:1: The well-tamed beast is the one led to the crowd;

dhp321:3: the tamed person who endures abuse
dhp321:4: is the best of human beings.
dhp322:1: Those who have tamed themselves are better
dhp323:2: would you go to the untrodden place,
dhp323:3: whereas, with the help of one whose self is well tamed,
dhp323:4: you go there, tamed by the tamed.

dhp325:1: One who gets drowsy from overeating,
dhp325:2: fond of sleep, rolling round the bed
dhp325:3: like a great hog stuffed with grain:
dhp325:4: that idiot is reborn again and again.
dhp326:1: In the past my mind wandered
dhp326:2: how it wished, where it liked, as it pleased.

dhp327:2: Take good care of your mind!
dhp327:3: Pull yourself out of this pit,
dhp327:4: like an elephant sunk in a bog.
dhp328:1: If you find an alert companion,
dhp328:4: wander with them, joyful and mindful.
dhp329:1: If you find no alert companion,

dhp329:4: wander alone like a tusker in the wilds.
dhp330:3: Wander alone and do no wrong,
dhp330:4: at ease like a tusker in the wilds.
dhp331:1: A friend in need is a blessing;

dhp331:3: good deeds are a blessing at the end of life,
dhp331:4: and giving up all suffering is a blessing.
dhp332:1: In this world it’s a blessing to serve

dhp333:1: It’s a blessing to keep precepts until you grow old;
dhp333:2: a blessing to be grounded in faith;
dhp333:3: the getting of wisdom’s a blessing;
dhp333:4: and it’s a blessing to avoid doing wrong.
